1.「よく来てくれたでンス。 | どうぐ使いとして さらに強くなったようで| さすが: Thank you for coming... It seems you've grown|even stronger as a tool user.<pc> I'm sorry.

2.「ちょっと お話が あるでンスから| こっちへ 来てほしいでンスよ。: I'd like to have a word with you, and I'd|like you to come over here...

3.「ご主人さまをさらった 隊長ゴルゴンザでンスが| 当分は 魔界に戻れないと思うで: Captain Gorgonzha, who kidnapped my master,|won't be able to return to the demon world|for a while...

4.「というのも 魔界に戻るためには| 魔界へ通じる門を開く必要が あるでンスが|: In order to return to the demon world, you|need to open the gate to the demon world, but|this will take some time...

5.「今頃 奴らは この世界のどこかで| 魔界への門を 開いているはずでンスよ……。: They should be opening the gates to the demon|world somewhere in this world by now.

6.「この間に ご主人さまを 助けなくては| ならないでンスが 今の <pc>さんで: We have to save the master while we can| Don't be<pc> You can't beat Gorgonzha, Hans...

7.「でも ご主人さまが編み出した| どうぐ使いの必殺技を 習得すれば| きっと 勝: But if you can master the special tool-using|techniques master has devised, you'll have a|better chance of winning...

8.「お願いでンス <pc>さん。| ゴルゴンザに勝つために 必殺技を| 習得しても: Please<pc> I'm sorry. Can you learn a special move to|defeat Gorgonza?

9.「魔物を従えている状態で| ゴブル砂漠西などにいる <%sEV_QUE_NAME:
I want you to kill <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>|<%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in the|Gobble Desert West and other areas with|
|demons in tow...

10.「必殺技を習得するには この特訓が| どうしても 必要になるでンス。| それでは: You'll need this training to master your|special moves. I'll see you later.

11.「ご主人さまが編み出した どうぐ使いの必殺技を| 習得すれば 隊長ゴルゴンザとの: If I can master the special moves my master|has created for me, I'll have a fighting|chance against Captain Gorgonza...

12.「ただ その前に 必殺技習得の準備として| やってきてほしいことが あるでンスよ: But before you do that, there's something I|want you to do to prepare for your special|move.

13.「魔物を従えている状態で| ゴブル砂漠西などにいる <%sEV_QUE_NAME:
I want you to kill <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>|<%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in the|Gobble Desert West and other areas with|
|demons in tow...

14.「必殺技を習得するには この特訓が| どうしても 必要になるでンスよ……。| <: You'll need this training to master your|special moves.<pc> Hi. Nice to meet you...

15.「おお！ 特訓をこなしたでンスね！| では 最後の仕上げでンスよ！: Oh! You've done your training! Now for the|final touches!

16.「<pc>さん！ マスターキーを| 取り出してもらってもいいでンスか！？<yes: <pc> Sir! Can you get the master key out of my|hand?<yesno><close>

18.「<pc>さんが 特訓をこなしたおかげで| キーに パワーが たまったでンス。|: <pc> Thanks to your training, the key has been|filled with power. And now the limiter has|been released.

19.「さあ その マスターキーを使って| ボクの二段目の引き出しを 開くでンス。|: Now, I'm going to use that master key to open|my second drawer... And take out whatever's|in there.

20.<pc>は タンスの引き出しを開け|中に入っていた本を 取り出した！: <pc> He opened the drawer of the dresser and took|out the book that was inside!

21.「その本は ご主人さまが長年の研究の末に| 編み出したという どうぐ使いの必殺技: That book is a manual on how to master the|special moves of a potion wielder, written by|the master after years of research...

22.「その本を読めば どうぐ使いの必殺技が| 習得できるはずでンスよ。: If you read that book, you should be able to|learn all the tricks of the trade...

23.<pc>は|『どうぐ使い必殺技マニュアル』と|書かれた本を 読んだ。: <pc> I've been looking for a book called "A Manual|of Special Moves for Pawns."

25.「その必殺技があれば 隊長ゴルゴンザとの| 戦いを 優位に進められるはずでンス。: With that special move, you'll have the upper|hand in the fight against Captain Gorgonza...

26.「……と言いたいところでンスが| すでに 必殺技を習得してるようでンスね。| で: ... I'd like to say I've already mastered a|special move, but... So here's one for you...

27.「前に ご主人さまには 夢があると言ったのを| 覚えてるでンスか？: Remember when I told you that master has|dreams?

28.「じつは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すことこそが| ご主人さまの夢だったでンスよ。| そ: In fact, it was Master's dream to defeat|Captain Gorgonzha. And it's also my dream...

29.タンスが 自分の戸棚を開けると|なんと たくさんの どうぐが飛び出した！: When the wardrobe opened its own cupboard,|out popped a whole bunch of stuff!

30.「ボクの中には ご主人さまが集めてた| アストルティアで使われている どうぐが|: I've got a lot of stuff in there that|Master's been collecting, stuff that's used|in Astrutia.

31.「魔界にいた頃から ご主人さまは| この世界の住人が作った どうぐを| 集めるこ: Ever since he was in the demon world,|Master's hobby has been collecting tools made|by the inhabitants of this world...

32.「この世界のどうぐに魅せられた ご主人さまは| やがて 好きが高じて どうぐの能: The master was fascinated by the animals of|this world, and eventually his love for them|led him to research their abilities...

33.「だけど 魔界の連中は 意味のない研究などせず| 強化薬の開発を続けるよう いつ:
But those in the demon world were always|urging their masters to continue developing|potions instead of doing meaningless|
|research, right?

34.「ある日 ご主人さまは 自分の研究の価値を| 証明すべく どうぐを使った 自作の: One day, master wanted to prove the value of|his research, so he challenged Gorgonza to a|battle using a weapon of his own creation...

35.「その戦闘兵器こそが このボク……| バトルガジェット１号 タンスだったでンスよ: And that weapon of war is me. Battle Gadget|One. It was a chest of drawers.

36.「ボクは ご主人さまの期待に応えようと| 隊長ゴルゴンザと戦ったでンスが ボロボ:
I tried to live up to my master's|expectations by fighting Captain Gorgonza,|but I was beaten to a pulp and my body could|
|never fight again.

37.「敗北を喫した ご主人さまは アイツに勝つには| どうぐの扱いに長けた アストル:
The master, defeated, decided that the only|way to defeat him was to enlist the help of|the inhabitants of Astrutia, who were skilled|
|in the use of tools...

38.「そして ご主人さまとボクは この世界に来て| 最初に出会った者に キーを与えた: And the master and I gave the key to the|first person we met when we came into this|world... ... The key.<pc> It was you, sir...

39.「<pc>さん……。ご主人さまの研究を| カケラも理解しようとしなかった あの巨:
Miss... I want that Titan who didn't even try|to understand a shred of his master's|research to show me how strong a tool user|
|can be...

40.「今のうちに 修行して | あの巨人を倒す 心の準備ができたら| また ここに戻: I want you to train now, and come back here|when you're ready to defeat that Titan...

41.「ボクは それまでに| 奴らの居場所を 探しておくでンス。: I'm going to find out where they are by then.

42.「ご主人さまは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すという夢を| <pc>さんに 託したでンスよ: Master dreams of defeating Captain Gorgonzha|<pc> I entrusted it to you. It's my dream, too...

43.「ご主人さまの研究の価値を カケラも| 理解しようとしなかった あの巨人に| ど:
I want you to show that giant, who refused to|understand even a shred of the value of|Master's research, just how powerful a tool|
|user he is...

44.「修行して もっと強い どうぐ使いになったら| また ここに戻ってきてほしいでン:
I hope you'll come back here when you've|trained and become a stronger potion user...|In the meantime, we'll find out where they|
|are.

45.「ご主人さまは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すという夢を| <pc>さんに 託したでンスよ: Master dreams of defeating Captain Gorgonzha|<pc> I entrusted it to you. It's my dream, too...

46.「ご主人さまの研究の価値を カケラも| 理解しようとしなかった あの巨人に| ど:
I want you to show that giant, who refused to|understand even a shred of the value of|Master's research, just how powerful a tool|
|user he is...

47.「あの巨人を倒す 心の準備ができたら| また ここに戻ってきてほしいでンスよ。|: I hope you'll come back here when you're|ready to defeat those Titans. In the|meantime, I'll find out where they are!

48.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！| では 必殺技を習得するための準備として| やって: Oh! Thank you! Now, there's something I want|you to do to prepare for the special move...

49.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！| ありがたいでンスが…………: Oh! Thank you! Thank you, but...

50.「<pc>さんは 頼まれごとで| いっぱいでンスね……。でも 急ぎでンスから|: <pc> You've got a lot of work to do... But I'm in|a hurry, so I'll just go take care of that!

51.「そうでンスか……。でも この世界で| 頼れるのは <pc>さんだけでンス。|: So... But in this world, the only thing you|can count on...<pc> Just you. I'm waiting for you to trust me.

52.「最後の仕上げには マスターキーが| どうしても 必要なんでンス。| ツベコベ言: I really need the master key for the final|touches, so... I'm gonna get it out of here.
